revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

{{stack begin}} {{Taxobox | image = Amanita_vittadini.jpg | image_caption = ''Amanita vittadinii'' in grass in Italy | regnum = [[Fungi]] | divisio = [[Basidiomycota]] | classis = [[Agaricomycetes]] | ordo = [[Agaricales]] | familia = [[Amanitaceae]] | genus = ''[[Amanita]]'' | species = '''''A. vittadinii''''' | binomial = ''Amanita vittadinii'' | binomial_authority = ([[Giuseppe L. Moretti|Moretti]]) Vittadini (1826) | synonyms_ref = {{cite web |url=http://www.speciesfungorum.org/Names/SynSpecies.asp?RecordID=816367|title=Synonymy: ''Saproamanita vittadinii'' |work=Species Fungorum |accessdate=2017-05-31}} | synonyms = * ''Agaricus vittadinii'' Moretti
* ''Aspidella vittadinii'' (Moretti) [[Jean-Edouard Gilbert|E.-J. Gilbert]] * ''Lepidella vittadinii'' (Moretti) E.-J. Gilbert * ''Saproamanita vittadinii'' ([[Giuseppe L. Moretti|Moretti]]) (Moretti) Redhead, Vizzini, Drehmel & Contu (2016) }} {{mycomorphbox | name = ''Amanita vittadinii'' | whichGills = free | capShape = convex | hymeniumType=gills | stipeCharacter=volva | ecologicalType=saprotrophic | sporePrintColor=white |howEdible=unknown }} {{stack end}} '''''Amanita vittadinii''''', commonly known as the '''Vittadini's lepidella''', is a European [[saprophyte]] mushroom classified in the genus ''[[Amanita]]'' Unlike some ''Amanitas'', this species is known to occur without accompanying woody plant symbionts.From R. E. Tulloss' website - [http://www.eticomm.net/~ret/amanita/species/vittadin.html 'Amanita vittadinii (Moretti) Vitt. "Vittadini's Lepidella"']. It has a general aspect somewhat between ''[[Macrolepiota]]'' and ''[[Armillaria]]'', but it is characterized by a pure white colour overall (whilst those genera are brownish) and by the [[:wikt:squamous|squamous]] (scaly) covering of cap and stipe.(Translated from Spanish to English)[http://translate.google.co.in/translate?hl=en&sl=es&u=http://www.amanitacesarea.com/amanita-vittadinii.html&ei=slQCTb6KN4_MrQe8x4GRDw&sa=X&oi=translate&ct=result&resnum=4&ved=0CDIQ7gEwAzgU&prev=/search%3Fq%3Damanita%2Bvittadini%26start%3D20%26hl%3Den%26client%3Dfirefox-a%26sa%3DN%26rls%3Dorg.mozilla:en-US:official%26prmd%3Div Amanita vittadinii(Moretti)at www.amanitacesarea.com (by José Cuesta and Jorge Jiménez)].{{cite journal |vauthors=Vizzini A, Redhead SA, Dovana F |title=Epitypification of ''Agaricus vittadinii'' (Basidiomycota, Amanitaceae)|journal=Phytotaxa |volume=326 | issue = 3 |pages=230–234|year=2017 |doi=10.11646/phytotaxa.326.3.8}} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== [https://pringlelab.botany.wisc.edu/pubs/The%20genus%20Amanita%20should%20not%20be%20split.pdf The genus Amanita should not be split] {{Amanitas}} {{Taxonbar|from=Q922092}} [[Category:Amanitaceae]] [[Category:Fungi of Europe]] [[Category:Fungi described in 1826]]
